com.ipt.ebsa.hiera

Class HieraData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.hiera.HieraData

  • public final class HieraData
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a means to load all of the HieraData and reference it thereafter. It has a copy method which does a deep copy allowing the state to be preserved at any point in time.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String ABSENT
      Used as: - a marker within the engine to indicate a component is to be made absent on the target - the String incorporated into update yaml files to action making a component absent
      static java.lang.String ENSURE
      Used as: - a marker within the engine to indicate a component is to be made present on the target - the String incorporated into update yaml files to action installing a component if it's not already present
      static java.lang.String HIERA_SYSTEM_PACKAGES 
      static java.lang.String SEPARATOR
